value:
I'm heading out on patrol. I heard that
Grima may have been spotted in this
world, so we must remain vigilant.

It's hard to feel at ease when wielding
a weapon I'm not used to. I suppose
the only remedy is more training...

You have bags under your eyes.
Have you not been resting well? Or
were you up late reading again?

It requires a keen eye to hit a distant
target. My eyesight happens to be
quite finely honed.$k$pI often keep an eye on you as well.

You...you wish to inquire regarding
this...shattered training dummy? It
was...um...beyond my control...$k$pI was practicing speed nocking, and I
became so focused that...well...as
you can see...

My name is Lucina. It's quite nice to
see you, $Nu.$k$pYou're right—this isn't my usual
outfit. Good eye!

I feel as if I could shoot a star out
of the sky!

Not bad...but I'll continue to
improve with more experience.

My apologies... Perhaps I'm just
better with a sword.

This thrill is second only to slipping
into a new outfit.

I am Lucina, daughter of the Exalt
Chrom of the Halidom of Ylisse. I
come wielding a legendary bow.

Oh, $Nu!$k$pM-my apologies. I must seem so
flustered right now... Was my visage
truly contorted in such a manner?$k$pI heard the fell dragon Grima may
have appeared in this world, as well...$k$pThe very same that led my own world
to ruin. I was not strong enough back
then...$k$pI was unable to protect my own
parents...my own precious friends
and allies... I could protect no one.$k$pWhen I think that the same awful fate
may befall another world, I suppose
I cannot help but scowl.$k$pEven the aid of a legendary weapon
such as this does little to console me.
But, $Nu...$k$pThank you. You are kind to offer your
assistance. I will never turn it down.$k$pI don't want to lose anyone so special
to me ever again. And with your aid,
perhaps I won't.
ええいっ！
それっ！
きゃああっ！
そんな…っ！
The future can be changed.
I won't lose!
Let's settle this!
There is hope for this world!
There's still hope...
Yes?
I'm Lucina, Chrom's daughter from the future.
After the things I have witnessed, I am not so easily startled.
So, what do you think of my outfit?
Could it be that Grima exists in this world as well? That means...
Thanks to my father and the strength of our bond...my future was saved.
Fell dragon Grima... I swear upon my life, I will defeat you once and for all.
I will not lose... Never again. Not as long as you and I share this bond.
Yes?
Can't decide...
Let's do it.
